text: 575, 816 people belonging to 149,678 families have been affected and 383 safety centers are in operation as of now.The number of deaths due to the floods and landslides has increased up to 193 while 94 are missing. 575, 816 people belonging to 149,678 families have been affected and 383 safety centers are in operation as of now.
title: 193 deaths, 94 missing due to floods and landslides
